articles.title: The Big Catch Up: Recovering the Gains Made in Africa through Vaccinations - Gavi, the Vaccine Alliance
articles.description: The advent of vaccines has been one of the greatest achievements in modern medicine, argues Dr Jean Kaseya, Director General of Africa CDC
articles.content: The advent of vaccines has been one of the greatest achievements in modern medicine, eradicating and controlling several life-threatening diseases that were once widespread. Routine immunisation syst… [+5409 chars]

articles.title: MASSIVE asteroid hurtling towards Earth TODAY at 17235 kmph - The South African
articles.description: NASA warned that a MASSIVE asteroid is set to make a close approach to Earth at a blistering speed of 17235 km per hour TODAY.
articles.content:
NASA has warned about a giant potentially hazardous space rock that is speeding towards Earth TODAY.
THE MASSIVE ASTEROID WITH HURTLE TOWARDS EARTH TODAY
